tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VaR_Calculation (
    instrument_id INT,
    instrument_name VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    quantity INT,
    risk_factor DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_instruments (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_name VARCHAR(255),
  instrument_type VARCHAR(50),
  market_value DECIMAL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE var_calculations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id UUID REFERENCES financial_instruments(id),
  var_value DECIMAL,
  calculation_date DATE,
  calculated_by VARCHAR(100)
);
